sourceDesc.p: Museum of New Zealand—Te Papa Tongarewa MU000094/006/0057

front.p: 1882 February 18: to Gore Museum of New Zealand—Te Papa Tongarewa MU000094/006/0057

body.p: As I know that Dr. Hector is now at the N. I do not write to him at present (which I had intended to do), but will do so when I know of his return to Wgn.

With this I send a Copy of our Annual Report for your Society—just received from Printer. You will note what a large no. of new members have lately joined us: and names of others have also since come in!

R.B. Gore, Esq Museum of New Zealand—Te Papa Tongarewa MU000094/006/0057
Secretary,
N.Z. Institute,
Wellington.

With my letter to you of the 4th. Jany. I sent an Abstract of the Proceedings of our Branch Institute for the past year: stating, in my letter, that I would send you the List of Members’ names when printed (to prevent any orthographical errors), and this I now do enclosed herewith.—
I also send you enclosed a corrected copy of the last paragraph of the said Abstract, which I will thank you to receive and put into its proper place in lieu of the former one.—
